Document.TEXT: Â Company Culture MHI believes company culture is an essential part of company development.The superior company culture could create a good enterprise environment, enhance the employee literacy and morality. And form the internal cohesion, centripetalism and constraint, so as to enhance the Company competitiveness. Products Expertise MHI supplies steel structures for mining & metal, oil & gas, power plant and commercial buildings projects, as well as gratings. Nowadays, MHI has presented a modularization tread. Production Facilities MHI has advanced production equipment and perfect facilities to ensure the smooth production in all processes. Meanwhile, MHI constantly brings in new production equipments to meet the different technical requirement. Quality Certificates
